#Abstract

Here, I re-examine the analysis of Oeppen and Vaupal (2002)


#Analysis
```{r}
data("gapminder_unfiltered")
gapminder_unfiltered %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  filter(lifeExp == max(lifeExp)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  select(year, country, lifeExp) %>%
  arrange(year) -> sundat
head(sundat)
  
```
